greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: First differences of A001511.
comment: For n even, sum_{k=1..n} a(k) > 0. For n odd, sum_{k=1..n} a(k) = 0. - _James Spahlinger_, Oct 13 2013
link: James Spahlinger, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
program: (PARI) {a(n) = my(A); if( n<0, 0, A = sum(k=0, length( binary(n+2)) - 1, x^(2^k) / (1 - x^(2^k)), x^3 * O(x^n));  polcoeff( (A * (1 - x) - x) / x^2, n))}; /* _Michael Somos_, May 11 2014 */
xref: Absolute values give A050603. Cf. A001511, A005187.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jun 03 2004
